function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased electricity usage in residential buildings due to changes in behavior during the pandemic.","Impact":"Higher energy bills and increased strain on the electrical grid.","Mitigation":"Encourage energy-efficient behavior and educate on sustainable energy use.","Technologies":"Smart home energy monitoring systems and energy-efficient appliances.","People":"Residents of residential buildings.","Owner":"Energy providers and local government."},{"Description":"Limited quantification of changes in electricity use for typical housing units during the pandemic.","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding and addressing the specific energy use patterns in residential buildings.","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed energy audits and data collection in residential buildings.","Technologies":"Smart meters, occupancy sensors, and data analytics tools.","People":"Energy researchers and building energy managers.","Owner":"Research institutions and energy management firms."},{"Description":"Impact of changes in heating and cooling (HVAC) energy use in residential buildings during the pandemic.","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential strain on HVAC systems.","Mitigation":"Optimize HVAC settings, promote energy-saving behaviors, and improve insulation.","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, HVAC monitoring systems, and building insulation materials.","People":"Residents of residential buildings.","Owner":"HVAC service providers and local government."}]}
